content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Two wooden chests storing iron plates at positions (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5)

### Empty Production Line (x=5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Burner inserter at position (5.5, 2.5)
- Wooden chest at position (5.5, 3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (x=2-4, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2.0, 7.0) and (4.0, 7.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5, 8.5) and (4.5, 8.5)
- Two wooden chests storing copper plates at positions (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)

### Power Generation System (x=-5.5 to 13.5, y=26.5 to 35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (not connected) at position (-5.5, 26.5)
- Working offshore pump at position (2.5, 35.5)
- Boiler at position (7.0, 35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5, 35.5)
- Two pipe groups:
  - Connected pipe group with water at positions around (5.5, 33.5)
  - Empty pipe group at positions around (9.5, 35.5)
- Electric pole network connecting various parts of the factory

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities at invalid locations
- Before placing a lab or any other entity, ensure the target location is:
  - Within buildable terrain
  - Not occupied by other entities
  - Within reach of the player character

### Power system inefficiencies
- Connect all components of the power system properly:
  - Ensure pipes form continuous connections between offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine
  - Keep boiler fueled to maintain power generation
  - Make sure steam engine is properly connected to receive steam from boiler
